name: jQuery Ajax Retry
body:
### About

This project is a plugin for jQuery that augments `$.ajax` by adding smart retry functionality.  Presently, it's retry strategy employs [exponential backoff](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exponential_backoff), or more specifically [truncated binary exponential backoff](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Truncated_binary_exponential_backoff), which can help alleviate server congestion.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
